yell.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to shout or say something very loudly, especially because you are frightened, angry, or excited
yell.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The crowd are on their feet yelling.
He could hear Pete yelling at the top of his voice  (=very loudly).
Clare yelled in pain as she fell.
Don’t you yell at me like that!
They yelled at him to stop.
yell at somebody to do something
yell.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: If you need me, just yell.
yell.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: She let out a yell when she saw me.
Dan gave a yell of delight when Larsson scored.
yell.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: words or phrases that students and cheerleaders shout together to show support for their school, college etc
